results.title: Paris N'existe Pas = Paris Does Not Exist
results.brief_description:
During an inspiration crisis, a young painter realises he is able to travel between two time periods. Worried about the dangers he might encounter during his time travels, his friends try to take him away from his ‘hallucinations’. The situation of the artist in his time and society is the main theme of this film inspired by surrealism.

Credits: Producer, Jean-Roch Rognoni ; director, Robert Benayoun ; writer, Robert Benayoun ; photography, Pierre Goupil ; music, Serge Gainsbourg.
Cast: Richard Leduc, Daniele Gaubert, Serge Gainsbourg, Monique Lejeune, Denise Peron.

results.title: Paris 1900: Chronique de 1900 a 1914
results.brief_description:
This is a montage of archival footage, newsreels and photographs evoking the political, social and artistic life of Paris at the turn of the century. The ironic tone of the narration underlines the contradiction between the sweetness of the period and the cataclysm of World War I. Personnalities appearing include: Gustave Eiffel, Marcelle Linder, Liane de Pougy, Caroline Otero, Cleo de Merode, Colette, la Comtesse d’Uzes, Buffalo Bill, Charles Pathe, Ferdinand Zecca (Pathe), Ferdinand Zecca, Andre Gide, Paul Valery, Guillaume Apollinaire, Louis Bleriot, Felix Mayol, Maurice Chevalier, Mistinguett, Polin, Sarah Bernhardt, Polaire, Jean Mounet-Sully, Leon Bonnat, Auguste Renoir, Claude Monet, Auguste Rodin, Leon Tolstoi, Jean Jaures, Aristide Briand, Leon Blum, Arthur Meyer, Maurice Barres. Includes segments from ‘Ceux de chez nous’ directed by Sacha Guitry. Reference: Forum des Images. http://www.vdp.fr

Credits: Producer, Pierre Braunberger ; director, writer, Nicole Vedres ; music, Guy Bernard ; assistant director, Alain Resnais ; editor, Yannick Bellon.
Cast: Claude Dauphin [narration].

results.title: Paris 1900
results.creator_credit: Pierre Braunberger, Edward Kingsley and Arthur Mayer
results.brief_description: A re-creation of Paris between the years 1900 and 1914, assembled from extracts from contemporary newsreels and other films. Great ladies, actresses and beauties, famous politicians , sportsmen and artists and the varied incidents of those years - from Bleriot’s flight across the channel to the eve of the 1914 war. Narrated by Monty Woolley.

results.title: Destiny's Angel
results.creator_credit: Craig Cottle and Craig Cottle Productions
results.brief_description: A young girl reacting unhappily to her parents’ recent divorce alienates herself from her girlfriends when she continually fails to attend ballet practice for a school performance. In the meantime, she forms a friendship with an old man who is the caretaker of the local conservatory, and, through him, comes to understand that problems must be confronted rather than avoided if a solution is to be found. Sadly, her friendship with the old man comes to an end with his death. This film raises issues for discussion such as responsibilities towards others, family situations, human relationships, old age and death. Cast includes Roy Witham and Saba Sluyter.

results.title: Destination: Port of Melbourne
results.creator_credit: Norman Godbold and Pan Pacific Pictures
results.brief_description: Follows the docking of a container ship. Aerial views show the layout of the port and ground shots provide a feeling of great activity in the port.

results.title: Detect and protect
results.brief_description: The basic elements of the drug story. How do you spot whether or not your child, or any other child is using drugs? What are the tell-tale emotional changes to watch for? What are the various types of drugs and which are the most dangerous? How do you protect the youngsters against becoming part of the drug scene> This film answers these questions simply.

results.title: Desperate remedies
results.creator_credit: Stewart Main, Peter Wells, James H. Wallace and James Wallace Productions
results.brief_description: Set in a highly stylised nineteenth century, ‘Desperate Remedies’ powerfully mixes the excitement of a subversive melodrama with the enchantment of historical romance. Set in a nineteenth century colony, it examines a society in which women outmanoeuvre the men. A beautiful woman, Dorothea Brooks, races her buggy down to the wharf. She picks out a handsome immigrant disembarking from a ship. Her quest is simple, almost shocking. She appears to be offering herself, he appears to be pliant and willing. But Dorothea has her feckless younger sister to consider. How can she extricate her from a destructive love affair? This seems to be Dorothea’s problem. ‘Desperate Remedies’ is the story of inhabitants trapped in the nightmarish colonial town called Hope, trying to outwit each other, bargaining, plotting, playing cat and mouse, fighting for what they desire most: all the time poised to accept their own desperate remedy. Cast includes Kevin Smith, Jennifer Ward-Lealand, Lisa Chappell, Kevin Smith and Clifford Curtis and Michael Hurst.

results.title: Desperately seeking Susan [DVD]
results.creator_credit: Susan Seidelman, Midge Sanford, Sarah Pillsbury and Orion Pictures Corporation
results.brief_description: Susan (Madonna) is a free spirit: she lives fast and breaks hearts. After walking out on a high roller in Atlantic City - taking a priceless pair of Egyptian earrings with her - she returns to New York, only to read a newspaper headline describing his murder. She doesn’t realise the killer is now on the trail of the earrings, a trail which will inevitably lead him to her. Meanwhile, bored housewife, Roberta (Rosanna Arquette) is idly reading the Personal Ads. “Desperately seeking Susan” announces a lover’s plea, and she wishes someone would desperately look for her. Susan makes the rendezvous and so does Roberta. And from then on their lives intertwine in a high-speed drama of fantasy and reality. Exchanging clothes, identities - and men, even the murderer doesn’t know which Susan he’s desperate to meet. Cast also includes Aidan Quinn.

results.title: Parents and children
results.creator_credit: Eurfron Gwynne Jones and Dick Foster
results.brief_description: The understanding and role of children in different societies, eg education system and valued roles. Highlighting various children in an education environment and the role of the educational bodies in diverse political systems. For example: collective education and education for the individual
